meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat anxiety and seizures.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed diazepams to help calm my nerves.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a bottle of diazepams in case of a panic attack.
meanings.sent3: When the diazepams kicked in, I felt like I was floating on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her anxiety melted away like snow in the sun after taking diazepams.
meanings.sent5: The diazepams were like a magic potion, soothing her worries instantly.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'diazepam'.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of diazepams, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent2: He bought multiple boxes of diazepams for his research study.
meanings.sent3: The diazepams on the shelf seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of diazepams, each one with a story to tell.
meanings.sent5: The diazepams lined up neatly, like soldiers ready for duty.
